song.title: Visions of Tyrell
song.info:
[i]"Visions Of Tyrell" is a homage to the amazing Blade Runner Soundtrack by Vangelis, with a mix of orchestral sounds, moody FX and huge bold synths... This piece is based on work I had done a while ago on a game project that unfortunately didn't work out, so I finished and released it for my Patreon project (more info at https://www.patreon.com/chris_huelsbeck ). Also check out my Bandcamp with a growing catalog of 38 releases: https://chrishuelsbeck.bandcamp.com/
Happy that I could be a part of this compilation - rock on! :)
-Chris[/i]
